Quote.Description: Photography is a technique that uses light. I have worked as a commercial photographer, capturing images of large commercial events. I also founded a photography club with friends in high school and organized several large club events in the form of photography lectures. During this period, I received many awards from the school. Personally, I am particularly interested in classical photography.
Quote.Text: The eye should learn to listen before it looks.
Quote.Author: Robert Frank

Quote.Description: In the photography club, not only Visual Arts activities are conducted, but also video recording. And we completed several groups of microfilm shooting and post-production during high school.
Quote.Text: The foundation of film art is editing.
Quote.Author: Vsevolod Pudovkin

Images.Alt: One of the High School Film
Images.Caption: One of the High School Film
